Changes: If Gus comes into Dad's store and wants to buy 3 boxes of wheat flour, 1 bag of sugar, and 2 bottles of vinegar, how much would that cost? How much change would Gus get if he only had X money?

Entries.31032027: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Pierre 2 19 3 Penny 3 23 1 Abigail 9 20 2 Jas 6 24 0 Vincent 7 24 0/viewport 6 25 true/pause 2000/addConversationTopic ItTakesAVillage_AbbyEcon {{MinimumDaysBetweenLessons}}/skippable/faceDirection Jas 3/faceDirection Vincent 1/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 0/faceDirection Vincent 0/speak Abigail "Alright kiddos! Who's up for a little econ 101?$h"/jump Jas 4/pause 100/shake Vincent 200/pause 800/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 28/pause 100/faceDirection Pierre 2/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection Jas 2 true/faceDirection Vincent 2/faceDirection Pierre 3/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Abigail "Hi @, I was just about to start a little lesson."/emote farmer 8/move farmer -3 0 0/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection Vincent 0 true/faceDirection Jas 0/speak Abigail "Ok, for our first example: Gus comes into Dad's store to buy some supplies for the Saloon.#$b#If he wants to buy 3 boxes wheat flour which cost 100 each, 1 jar of sugar which cost 100 each, and 2 bottles of vinegar which cost 200 each,#$b#what's the total Gus owes?"/pause 100/emote Pierre 32/pause 100/emote Vincent 28 true/emote Jas 40/speak Vincent "Um, Ms. Abigail, could you repeat the question?$3"/speak Abigail "Sure! This time I'll get some visual aids.$h"/move Abigail 3 0 0/pause 400/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/move Abigail -4 0 2/playSound throwDownITem/addObject 8 21 246/addObject 8 22 246/addObject 8 23 246/speak Abigail "3 boxes of wheat flour costing 100 each,"/move Abigail -1 0 2/playSound throwDownITem/addObject 7 21 245/speak Abigail "1 jar of sugar costing 100 each,"/move Abigail -1 0 2/playSound throwDownITem/addObject 6 21 419/addObject 6 22 419/speak Abigail "2 bottles of vinegar costing 200 each."/pause 300/jump Jas 6/speak Jas "Ms. Abigail, I think I know!"/speak Abigail "Well come on up here and tell me, let's give Vincent a chance to work through it."/speed Jas 4/move Jas -1 0 0/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 -4 1/emote Jas 40/speak Abigail "That's correct!$h"/emote Jas 32/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 4 0/pause 400/move Vincent 1 0 0/pause 400/move Vincent -2 0 0/pause 400/speak Vincent "800?!"/speak Abigail "You got it!$h"/jump Vincent 4/pause 300/speak Abigail "Ok, now what happens if Gus only has 1000? How much change would he get?"/emote Vincent 40/jump Jas 8/pause 200/speed Jas 6/speed Jas 6/move Jas 0 -4 1/emote Jas 40/speak Abigail "Right again!$h"/speed Jas 6/speed Jas 6/move Jas 0 4 0/speak Vincent "200?"/speak Abigail "You got it again! Great crowd!$h"/emote Jas 56 true/emote Vincent 56/emote Penny 32 true/emote farmer 32/end
